Protocols/VHLoadingProtocol.html#/s:9VHL.name: startAnimating()
Protocols/VHLoadingProtocol.html#/s:9VHL.abstract: When you lock or show loading this function will be called.

Protocols/VHLoadingProtocol.html#/s:9VHL.name: stopAnimating()
Protocols/VHLoadingProtocol.html#/s:9VHL.abstract: When you unlock or hide loading this function will be called.

Protocols/VHLoadingProtocol.html.name: VHLoadingProtocol
Protocols/VHLoadingProtocol.html.abstract: Your custom loading view controller must confirm this protocol for framework compatibility

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC9VHL.name: showVHLoading(controller:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC9VHL.abstract: You can put an animator to top of your view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC9VHL.name: showVHLoading(controller:addingView:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC9VHL.abstract: You can put an animator to a view

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@VHLoading@.name: hideVHLoading()
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@VHLoading@.abstract: You can hide the loading you show.

Classes/VHLoading/Place.html#/s:9VHLoadi.name: splash
Classes/VHLoading/Place.html#/s:9VHLoadi.abstract: Place to use animations in Splash Screen

Classes/VHLoading/Place.html#/s:9VHLoadi.name: lock
Classes/VHLoading/Place.html#/s:9VHLoadi.abstract: Place to use animations in Lock Screen

Classes/VHLoading/Animation.html#/s:9VHL.name: defaultWith(backgroundColor:)
Classes/VHLoading/Animation.html#/s:9VHL.abstract: This animation uses a normal indicator with background color

Classes/VHLoading/Animation.html#/s:9VHL.name: custom(_:)
Classes/VHLoading/Animation.html#/s:9VHL.abstract: This animation uses a custom controller which supplied by you

Classes/VHLoading/Animation.html#/s:9VHL.name: animator()
Classes/VHLoading/Animation.html#/s:9VHL.abstract: Generates a new animator for related type

Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC8.name: Animator
Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC8.abstract: Type of ViewController which works with VHLoading

Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC1.name: useNewWindow
Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC1.abstract: If it is true Lock and Splash controllers are show in different UIWindow rather than main window.

Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC8.name: isForced
Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC8.abstract: If this is true you can not change the lock type or unlock the screen until isForced is true again.

Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC1.name: lockScreen(for:isForced:)
Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC1.abstract: You can lock your app screen with Place.lock or with Place.splash.

Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC1.name: unlockScreen(isForced:)
Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC1.abstract: You can unlock your app screen for both lock and splash places.

Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC1.name: setAnimation(_:for:)
Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC1.abstract: You can set an animation for a Place.

Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC8.name: animator(for:)
Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC8.abstract: You can get current instance of Animator for releated place if it is currently shown.

Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC1.name: newAnimator(for:)
Classes/VHLoading.html#/s:9VHLoadingAAC1.abstract: You can get new instance of Animator which is currently used by the framework.

Classes/VHLoading/Place.html.name: Place
Classes/VHLoading/Place.html.abstract: Places can be shown for loading controllers.

Classes/VHLoading.html.name: VHLoading
Classes/VHLoading.html.abstract: This framework not only gives some choices to use but also you can set your own loading animator.
